body.name: Ninja 10 Qt 6-in-1 XL DualZone Air Fryer with 2 Baskets, Match Cook & Smart Finish - Grey
features: 2 INDEPENDENT BASKETS: The XL version of the original Air Fryer with 2 independent baskets, the XL air fryer lets you cook 2 foods, 2 ways, at the same time, eliminating back-to-back cooking like a traditional single-basket air fryer. Now in larger 5-quart baskets.
6-IN-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Includes 6 versatile cooking programs: Air Fry, Air Broil, Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate.
SEPARATE HEATING ZONES: 2 independent XL 5-qt. zones have their own cooking baskets, cyclonic fans, and rapid heaters.
LESS FAT: Up to 75% less fat than traditional air frying methods. Tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries.
FASTER COOKING: Cooks two 6-lb. chickens up to 30% faster than a traditional oven. Frozen-to-crispy meals in 30 minutes. Wide temperature range: 105°F–450°F
body.description: Meet the Ninja Foodi XL 2-Basket Air Fryer, that lets you cook 2 foods, 2 ways and finish at the same time. This bigger and faster air fryer has XL 10-qt. capacity and includes 6 versatile cooking functions. Not only is this great for large family meals and entertaining, but this air fryer has DualZone Technology and IQ Boost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Remarkable Experience
reviews.reviewText: Despite initial skepticism, this purchase has proven to be a wise decision. Thorough research, ease of use, effective cooking performance, and straightforward maintenance are the key factors that have made this air fryer a standout product. I highly recommend this air fryer to anyone seeking a reliable, user-friendly, and high-performance kitchen appliance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use it almost daily
reviews.reviewText: I'm a single woman who feels it's pointless to cook for one. With this, I find myself cooking a lot! So convenient and I love the 2 large drawers. It's very quiet, is easily cleaned and has several different functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Ninja
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic buy. It does a lot, it is user-friendly, and cleaning is so easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Air fry solution for multiple items
reviews.reviewText: We replaced a great Ninja single Air Fryer with this dual model. Easy to use for two items one wants to cook to finish at the same time. Works great. Only note is that the cook time seems longer. It's stated when using both sides to allow longer. Overall this is a plus for us to prepare healthier meals for two aged adults. Amazon refurbished is as new in this case. Rated very good. Our single unit is still great after a few years of frequent use. I expect same on this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quite enough and easy to clean. The use of the drop in paper a great deal easier to clean. Dual cooking with match side cooking. Cooks as it should and makes life easier. Cons are, it needs space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing in all features. It’s quick and easy to use. My kids use this daily. Has accessories to make clean up that much easier. But the quality of food this cooks the food is insane. Takes up some counter space but definitely worth it. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like Smart feature
reviews.reviewText: It’s nice to air fry two different foods at one time with the Smart feature. Select the foods temperatures and time and walk away. The portion size is limited but I’m sure you can buy a larger air fryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Air Fryer...I'll explain why...
reviews.reviewText: So here's the deal. You're in the air fryer aisle, and you see those beautiful stainless steel and glass air fryers. They look amazing...and there is no doubt most of them look more appealing than this Ninja Black air fryer. Here's the deal tho...those beautiful glass door air fryers you see in the store are going to get dirty when you cook with them. The grease from the wings and every other thing you cook in it eventually stains the glass of those fancy looking air fryers. The black air fryers such as this one looks never gets stained or becomes an eye sore. As far as performance? I love this air fryer and it's absolutely the best air fryer I've ever had. I highly recommend....
